dungeon.intro: You step inside the door beneath the old weather-beaten sign: The Rumor Mill, and find yourself in the interior of a darkened and smokey room. As your eyes adjust to the dimness, you see serving women preparing food. The burly Innkeeper is filling mugs from behind a solid oak bar along the north wall.
dungeon.room: The common room of this Inn is heated by the large fireplace near the center of the room. Rough wooden tables are scattered about the main floor. A couple of booths can be seen along the east wall. The aroma of roasted meats and ale fills the air, and the smokey smell of the fireplace thinly covers it all.

innkeeper.name: Bork
innkeeper.description: The Innkeeper intently polishes glasses, but he notices every move in the Inn.

The Innkeeper is a burly man with a thick beard. His apron is stained with food and wine. The faint smell of fireplace smoke drifts to you as he gets closer. "See anything you like?", he asks in a semi-toothless smile.
innkeeper.message: My name is Bork, and I own this fine establishment
My Inn has great food, beer, wine, and a place to rest your feet after a weary day. Then he winks and says, "It also has some very interesting characters here, if you know what I mean."
Buying drinks for folks will help loosen their tongues.
Don't insult someone before asking for a favor.
Make sure to have plenty of torches before going underground.
I need to clean up now for the night. I'll talk with you tomorrow.
I'm the Innkeeper here. Wha'cha want?"
People who buy nothing make poor customers.
Are you going to buy something or just stand around looking pretty?
I'm busy right now. Talk to me in the morning.
You have to leave now. I need to close up.

patron.name: Sal
patron.description: A tiny man, wearing stained clothes, carries a huge burlap sack bulging with "something".
This tiny man is perpetually hunched over from his large sack of shoes. Looking at your feet, he shakes his head and smiles at you pathetically.
patron.message: "Sal's the name, cobbling is the game!"
"Looks like you could use some good shoe leather."
"Rats make for lousy shoes."
"I peddle shoes not prattle! Beat it!"
"No shoes, no service!"
"Not all the heels of this world are on shoes."

patron.name: Scruffy
patron.description: A scruffy-looking old man with a grizzled chin looks around warily.
Close up, this old geezer is a mess. His hair is uncombed, his beard is gnarled, several teeth are missing, and he smells as if he hasn't had a bath since spring.
patron.message: "Sit down and talk a spell."
"You must be thirsty with all that curiosity built up, eh?"
"The mad hermit is alive and roams the northern forest."
"Go bother someone else."
"I don't know nuttin', and I don't want to talk about it."
"Innkeeper! Can't a guy enjoy a little peace and quiet!"

patron.name: Boren
patron.description: A large man sits astride his bench, sipping deeply on a stein of ale.
Although his face is ruddy and clean, his leather overalls are covered with soot and coaldust. His forearms are as large as your thighs.
patron.message: He exhales alcoholic fumes in satisfaction. "Well stranger, sit down and whet your whistle."
"I'm too thirsty to do much talking. You buying?"
RUMOR
He stares at you silently.
He furls his brow. "Hey buddy! I just came for a cool one, not a conversation."
RETORT

patron.name: Meladriel
patron.description: A beautiful young lady, in a low-cut purple dress, eyes you expectantly and smiles.
The young lady stares alluringly into your eyes. "See anything you like?"
patron.message: "Hello," she says in a cool voice, "My name is Meladriel."
I'm sure there is something I can do for you."
RUMOR
"You don't look like my type."
She puts on her cloak and covers her face.
RETORT

patron.name: Aragon
patron.description: Obviously well-to-do, a gentleman in chainmail armor is busy eating a large dinner.
As you approach, you see a barrel-chested man eating dinner. He shakes his head and smiles grimly to himself, as if to say, "Here comes another one."
patron.message: He smiles slightly and extends his hand, offering a seat at his table.
"I'm always up for a good adventure myself."
RUMOR
He looks sideways at you and says, "Begone!"
He puts his hand silently on the hilt of his sword, and slowly rises.
RETORT

patron.name: Matilda
patron.description: A plump woman in dusty traveling clothes eats noisily and alone at a table.
She continues to look at you and tears into a cooked chicken noisily, spattering little bits of food on the table.
patron.message: Have a seat, and grab a leg if you want.
"I like a man with a healthy appetite."
RUMOR
She continues to look at you and chews noisily, spattering little bits of what looks like chicken on the table.
"Don't know nothing, and I'm busy." She pushes more food into her face so that she can't talk.
RETORT

patron.name: Perrin
patron.description: A barrel-chested man, with a bow and quiver at his side, chews slowly and eyes you from a distance.
This man seems to have traveled many miles, but his worn pack, placed carefully on the floor, is well-kept. He has an attitude of competence. He looks down at his food as you approach.
patron.message: "Perrin's the name. I'm the village fletcher. He extends a calloused hand."
"If you've a need of anything, my shop is down the street. Can't miss it. I'll give you a good price."
RUMOR
He turns his back and continues eating.
"We don't cotton to strangers in this town. It's a peaceful town, and we like it that way."
RETORT
